# t-progress-bar



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                           | Description                       |
| ------------------------------ | --------------------------------- |
| `--progress-bar-background`    | Background of the progress bar    |
| `--progress-bar-border-radius` | Border radius of the progress bar |
| `--progress-bar-font-size`     | Font size of the progress bar     |
| `--progress-bar-height`        | Height of the progress bar        |
| `--progress-bar-overflow`      | Overflow of the progress bar      |
| `--progress-display`           | Display of the progress bar       |
